data.description: This playbook executes remediation actions to clear a rootkit infection on an endpoint

cells.name: quarantine device
cells.title: Contain

active_values.body: A rootkit was discovered on a device, which was then reverted to an earlier VM snapshot.  See Phantom for more details.
active_values.subject: Rootkit was remediated

fields.body: A rootkit was discovered on a device, which was then reverted to an earlier VM snapshot.  See Phantom for more details.

active_values.description: Machine was discovered by phantom to have a rootkit.  See Phantom for more information.
active_values.summary: Machine was identified with a rootkit.
